content: असाधारण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Not common, peculiar, special, specific. {@--2@} (In logic) Existing neither in सपक्ष or विपक्ष as a {%hetu%}; यस्तूभयस्माद् व्यावृत्तः स त्वसाधारणो मतः. {@--3@} Not to be claimed by any one else, exclusively belonging to one (as wealth &c.); पिता पुत्रांतरेष्वपि साधारणो माता त्वसाधारणी <ls>Mit.</ls> --णः A fallacy or हेत्वाभास in Logic; one of the three kinds of अनैकांतिक <ab>q. v.</ab> --णं Speciality, special property.
